messages.speech: A 1040 is a form is a form US citizens use for personal federal income tax returns. Filling out a 1040 will tell you how much you owe in taxes for a given year, or how much you'll be getting refunded by the government. 1040s are usually due on April 15th (unless this date is a Saturday, Sunday or legal holiday, in which case they're due on the next business day after April 15th).
